Eyes of a Nomad
Home Portfolio Work with Me Contact

Shiraz Riad, Morocco

hotel lifestyle

I had an opportunity to stay & shoot this recently renovated Riad (villa) in the heart of the old medina in Marrakech, Morocco. Similar to the villa I stayed & shot in Seville, the attention to detail here made it so photogenic. The light in Morocco is famous in the photography world & the way the architect has bought light into the building made shooting it a real pleasure.
